title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 08 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 08 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

 

Bernie suspends his campaign. Coronavirus acquires racial component, African-Americans hardest hit. Death models lowered again. Dr. Birx says anyone who dies with coronavirus will be counted as dying from coronavirus. Model reduced down from 2.2 million to 60,000, and 60,000 is roughly equivalent to flu deaths. The Doomsayers never lose when the models are wrong, credit social distancing actions. Only 1.9% of New Yorkers who’ve died with Covid-19 had no underlying condition. Libs like Zeke Emanuel are saying we can’t reopen the economy until we get a vaccine. What if we never do? Mnuchin, Kudlow say economy will reopen when the experts tell us it’s safe. Where is the empathy for the economic tragedy?


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

 

We can't wait for a vaccine, because we may never have one. Review of the HIV/AIDS crisis: The first epidemic with civil rights. Trump says he wants to reopen economy with a bang. CNN poll: 60% not comfortable reopening country on April 30th. We've destroyed the economy we've built. CDC looking at loosening recommendations for people who've been exposed. How long will country stay closed? Ivanka to head up small business revival.

 

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

 

Montage of liberals saying we can't reopen the economy for 18 months. Mnuchin says Trump will reopen the economy when he gets the "all clear". All clear from who? NY councilman claims Covid-19 deaths are undercounted. WHO says no to face masks. Virginia models revised downward too. We can't survive 18 months of this. If we don't open the economy soon, all we'll have left is the federal government, state governments will have no tax base. Caller on John Kerry. States tax unemployment checks. Birx's husband worked for the Clintons. Classifying coronavirus deaths. Pneumonia deaths down. Biden makes up another story.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
